name: Dangers in the Motor Vortex
description:
You always dreamed of living among the stars, but working a desk job at the Division for Maintenance and Vessels wasn't what you had in mind. Will you be stuck here forever or does life in space have more to offer?

Credits

  • Chel Wong : Music, Sound Design
  • Jacob Vander Ende : Team Lead, Game Design, Writing
  • Jose Gutierrez : Programming
  • Katie Golden : Production, Writing
  • Kelsie Mhoon : Narrative Lead, Writing
  • Laura Onderwater : Environment Art
  • Radiant G : Character Art
  • Star St.Germain : UI/UX Art/Design, Branding
  • Stav Hinenzon : Programming Lead
